ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Staff of Writhing/Crude Stein
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/12/00 10:36:40 AM US Mountain Standard Time, ... Put dirk in range slot if you dont have Marneks - but its worth 75p on Fennin I am not a
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/12/00 10:36:40 AM US Mountain Standard Time,
nkanodia@... writes:

> sell the dragoon dirk, as the staff is slightly better; what's its current
> value (I'm on Innoruuk)? guessing-- 50pp?
> sell the staff, as I can (probably) get more money for it; what's its
> current value? guessing--200pp?

Put dirk in range slot if you dont have Marneks - but its worth 75p on Fennin


I am not a fan of the staff I would sell it personally.

> second, what's the best way to get another stein? I've heard people
hunting
> bouncers often give them away; what zone are they in? Ferrott? Oggok?


Yes Bouncers in Feerott, 40+
